name: Add Google Sheets rows for opened Mailgun emails
description:
Every time your Mailgun recipient opens your email, Make will add a row with to your Google Sheets.
Make sure your spreadsheet looks like (this)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Sr8PpEtyY8MQS5LczrPvWLF5BCp4prpzm1NB-DIE76o/edit?usp=sharing], before running the scenario.
